input: Imagine a self-contained, hypothetical world with only the following conditions, and without any unmentioned factors or causal relationships: Poverty has a direct effect on water quality and cholera. Water company has a direct effect on water quality. Water quality has a direct effect on cholera. Poverty is unobserved. Method 1: We look at how water quality correlates with cholera case by case according to poverty. Method 2: We look directly at how water quality correlates with cholera in general. To understand how water quality affects cholera, is it more correct to use the Method 1 than Method 2?
